title: ReplayIt
description:
ReplayIt gives students, staff and family members the ability to upload, view, and share images throughout the year with your school. See the year as it happens!
Upload the picture you took from the big game or take one while hanging out with your friends at the pep rally and upload it immediately to be a part of your school’s ReplayIt experience.
See all the photos your friends have uploaded or share your favorite photo with friends or family.
If your school is enrolled in Time Capsule, photos you upload will be there for years to come. Extend your yearbook experience with ReplayIt!
Features:
Stay connected with your school.
Unlimited photos.
Take pictures within the app that save directly to your gallery.
Interact with friends by liking their photos.
Instant sharing by Email, Facebook and Twitter.
